com.solacesystems.jcsmp

Interface TextMessage

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BytesXMLMessage, Message, XMLMessage
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TextMessageImpl

    public interface TextMessage
extends Message
    TextMessage is used to send a message containing text.
